citations.desc: Records: Operators of auction sales and brokers.
citations.narrative:
On six(6) records of disposition the section for the USDA or Drivers license number was blank. The vehicle license
number and State, and the driver's license number (or photographic identification card for non-drivers issued by a State)
and State of the person, if he or she is not licensed or registered under the Act is required. This information needs to
documented
Correct from this date, January 26, 2024, going forward

There were two guinea pigs, housed in separate cages, that had a mild-moderate amount of green algae-like substance
growing along the inside of their plastic water bottles that were affixed to their cages. Lack of proper sanitization of the
water bottles could allow for harmful organisms to grow, which could negatively impact the health and well-being of the
animals. All watering receptacles must be sanitized when dirty. All water receptacles shall sanitized when dirty and at
least once every 2 weeks.
Correct from this date, January 26, 2024, going forward

There were 2 enclosures housing 3 hedgehogs and 1 short-tailed opossum, that had a mild-moderate amount of algae-
like material growing along the inside of their plastic water bottles that were affixed to their cages. Lack of proper
sanitization of the water bottles could allow for harmful organisms to grow, which could negatively impact the health and
well-being of the animals. All watering receptacles must be sanitized when dirty. All water receptacles shall be kept clean
and sanitary.
Correct from this day, January 26, 2024, going forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.76(a)(4) 
   
Records: Operators of auction sales and brokers. 
On six(6) records of disposition the section for the USDA or Drivers license number was blank. The vehicle license 
number and State, and the driver's license number (or photographic identification card for non-drivers issued by a State) 
and State of the person, if he or she is not licensed or registered under the Act is required. This information needs to 
documented 
Correct from this date, January 26, 2024, going forward 
3.30 
   
Watering. 
There were two guinea pigs, housed in separate cages, that had a mild-moderate amount of green algae-like substance 
growing along the inside of their plastic water bottles that were affixed to their cages. Lack of proper sanitization of the 
water bottles could allow for harmful organisms to grow, which could negatively impact the health and well-being of the 
animals. All watering receptacles must be sanitized when dirty. All water receptacles shall sanitized when dirty and at 
least once every 2 weeks. 
Correct from this date, January 26, 2024, going forward 
3.130 
   
Watering. 
There were 2 enclosures housing 3 hedgehogs and 1 short-tailed opossum, that had a mild-moderate amount of algae-
like material growing along the inside of their plastic water bottles that were affixed to their cages. Lack of proper 
sanitization of the water bottles could allow for harmful organisms to grow, which could negatively impact the health and 
well-being of the animals. All watering receptacles must be sanitized when dirty. All water receptacles shall be kept clean 
and sanitary. 
Correct from this day, January 26, 2024, going forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
